name: Schrodinger’s Duck
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned by sending a "Duck" monster from your hand or field to the GY. If this card is Special Summoned: You can flip a coin and call it. If you call it right, Special Summon a "Duck" monster from your GY, but its effects are negated. If you call it wrong, send this card to the GY. If this card is sent to the GY: You can add 1 "Duck" card from Deck to hand. If you Special Summon this card by the effect of "Quacktum Physic" you can Special Summon a level 6 or lower "Duck" Monster from your Deck. You can only use each effect of "Schrodinger’s Duck" once per turn.
